title: Life and Youth - metaphor in lines 41-42

content.question: In lines 41-42 (“Across the . . . smote”), the use of metaphor mainly serves to emphasize

choices.label: a drastic shift in the speaker’s deference to historical precedent
a release of the speaker from oppressive expectations
an important lesson the speaker has learned from peers
a sudden revelation that justifies the speaker’s opinions

content.answer: a release of the speaker from oppressive expectations

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
